alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 1:20PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COCONINO AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM MST... At 118 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountainaire, or 11 miles south of Flagstaff, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flagstaff, Pine Canyon, Flagstaff Pulliam Airport, Fisher Point, Oak Creek Vista Overlook, Kachina Village, Country Club, Canyon Vista CG, Lake Mary, Mormon Mountain, Fort Tuthill Park, West Fork Trailhead, Munds Park, Marshall Lake, Junipine Resort, Foxglenn Park, Buckhead Ridge, Garland`s Oak Creek Lodge, Lake View CG, and Pine Flat CG. This includes the following highways... Route 66 near mile marker 202. Interstate 40 between mile markers 196 and 197, and between mile markers 202 and 203. Interstate 17 between mile markers 320 and 339. State Route 89A between mile markers 383 and 398. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
